article_title: Fairfax, Canada Pension Plan at Odds Over CEO Voting Power
article_text:
Fairfax Financial Holdings Ltd. and major shareholder Canada Pension Plan Investment Board are at odds over the multiple-voting-share structure of the global insurance and investment-management company. The rift is underscoring a wider debate among executives, investors and corporate-governance watchers over the best way to manage a company’s long-term growth.

Fairfax is asking shareholders to approve a plan to preserve the voting power of the insurance giant’s Chairman and Chief Executive Prem Watsa. But CPPIB, Canada’s...
